mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, brand_id, brand_name, brand_logo, company_name, brand_uscc, connect_uname, connect_mobile_no, connect_wechat_id, brand_desc, company_desc, brand_detail, company_detail, vaild_date, expired_date, brand_fee, brand_margin, remark, status, create_time, last_modified_time, brand_common_desc from crm_brand_info where id = #{id}

update crm_brand_info
